name: Halloween Madness
summary:
Run past waves of zombies and skeletons through the abandoned city streets! Grab candy to receive extra points, find rare ones for even more points! Compete against the top 10 players on the leaderboards and unlock different pumpkins in the store! 
 
 
! DISCLAIMER ! 
- Credit for game assets (graphics, sound effects, music), go to their rightful creators! If you think you own the copyrights to any of the assets please contact me on the contact e-mail stated at the bottom of this page!
